Literature.Title: Comparative functional properties of engineered cationic antimicrobial peptides consisting exclusively of tryptophan and either lysine or arginine.
Literature.Author: Deslouches B, Hasek ML, Craigo JK, Steckbeck JD, Montelaro RC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MBC=0.8µM)
